properties.body:
GULF OF GUINEA.
CAMEROON.
1. MULTIPLE VESSELS ATTACKED IN VICINITY
   04-00.10N 009-38.00E AT 302245Z JUN.
   ONE VESSEL BOARDED AND FIVE CREW MEMBERS
   KIDNAPPED. VESSELS ARE ADVISED TO
   KEEP CLEAR OF THIS POSITION
   AND TO EXERCISE EXTREME CAUTION.
   REPORTS TO IMB PIRACY REPORTING CENTER,
   PHONE: 603 2031 0014, 603 2078 5763,
   FAX: 603 2078 5769,
   E-MAIL: IMBKL@ICC-CCS.ORG, PIRACY@ICC-CCS.ORG.
2. CANCEL THIS MSG 050143Z JUL 23.
